articles.description: Taking to Twitter, Iker Casillas had written in Spanish "I hope you respect me: I'm gay." However, he went on to delete the tweet within hours. and then issued a clarification.
articles.content: Legendary Spain and Real Madrid goalkeeper Iker Casillas said his account was hacked after he tweeted saying he was gay and then deleting the post within hours. Taking to Twitter, he had written in S… [+1521 chars]
